H0.text: what are the major languages spoken in the united kingdom. English

H1.text: what are the major languages spoken in the united kingdom. Welsh

H2.text: what are the major languages spoken in the united kingdom. Scottish Gaelic

H3.text: what are the major languages spoken in the united kingdom. Irish

A4.text: In the 2011 UK census, 98% of people over the age of three were reported as speaking English.

A5.text: Welsh is spoken by 538,300 people in Wales according to the 2021 census.

A6.text: In Wales and Northern Ireland, English is co-official alongside Welsh and Irish respectively.

A7.text: In the United Kingdom, the United States, Australia, and New Zealand, it is the dominant language for historical reasons without being explicitly defined by law.
